text: Kono byaktira jan'ya sangata naya ye, allah‌ take kitaba, hekamata o nabu'oyata dana karara para tini manusake balabena, ‘allah‌ra paribarte tomara amara dasa haye ya'o’ [1], baram tini balabena, ‘tomara rabbani [2] haye ya'o, yehetu tomara kitaba siksa da'o ebam yehetu tomara adhyayana kara.’
